name: fa-icons
description: A font awesome icon library for preact.
author: harsh vairagi

scripts.clean: npm run clean:solid && npm run clean:brands && npm run clean:regular
scripts.build:preact: vite build --config ./preact/vite.config.js && cd preact; npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:solid && npm run build:brands && npm run build:regular && npm run build:preact
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run create && npm run build
